definition: car/vehicle/CL:輛|辆[liang4]/machine/to shape with a lathe/Kangxi radical 159

sentences.english: Application of virtual prototype technology to portal cranes ro-ro shipping. ;
sentences.chinese: 將虛擬樣機技術應用於摺疊翼廂式車開啓系統的設計。

sentences.english: It is reported that the casualties are mostly small passenger van.
sentences.chinese: 據悉，傷亡人員大多是小型廂式車的乘客。

sentences.english: Mainly are vehicle of RHD type, such as HIACE series, etc.
sentences.chinese: 主要以各種右舵廂式車型車輛爲主，包括海獅系列等。

sentences.english: The model of lifting system is established by virtual prototype technology.
sentences.chinese: 將虛擬樣機技術應用於摺疊翼廂式車開啓系統的設計。

sentences.english: The invention discloses an interlock control system in a van .
sentences.chinese: 本發明公開了廂式車輛上互鎖控制系統。

sentences.english: The application of virtual prototyping technology in the clamp mechanism design;
sentences.chinese: 將虛擬樣機技術應用於摺疊翼廂式車開啓系統的設計。
